CustomField.formula: IF ( AND( ( AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL( Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c , 'Approval Required')) && NOT(ISNULL(Apttus_QPConfig__ConfigurationFinalizedDate__c)) && ( ISPICKVAL(APT_Overweight_Approval_Status__c, 'Approved') || ISPICKVAL(APT_Overweight_Approval_Status__c, '') ) ) || ISPICKVAL( Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c , 'Approved') ), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c , 'In Review')), Is_T_C_Enabled__c ) , HYPERLINK("/apex/c__APT_GenerateDocForT_C?parentId="&Id+"&docFormat=PDF" , IMAGE("/resource/APT_Include", "Create T&C"),"_self") , NULL)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: To generate copy of Master Service Agreement (does not apply to StarTrack agreement)
CustomField.label: Include Terms and Conditions?
